title: Bright-eyed and bushy tailed: Adorable fox pictures
text: show ad Bright-eyed and bushy tailed: Adorable collection of photographs capture life inside a working fox safari in Japan where animals are free to roam frozen forests The Fox Village in Japan is home to a leash of more than 100 foxes composed of a total of six different species Guests are invited into what is effectively a safari park for foxes and pay Â£6 to interact with the wild animals Among the dozens of stunning animals are a handful or slightly rarer breeds - a black fox and a white fox The photographs were taken by trainee teacher Natasha Puente, who is a self-confessesed fox fanatic
